product_name: Sea to Summit Big River Dry Bag - 35 Liters
long_description: Whether you're a backpacker, adventure racer, jungle trekker, boater or pack-rafter, you need to keep your gear dry and functioning. The Sea to Summit Big River dry bag was created with you in mind.
